name: Nightclub Beatdown
description:
Controls
Space - Pause Game
Mouse - Hover above cards or the draw pile to select them


A GMTK Game Jam 2020 entry by Jean-Luc Etgen, Lars Grevsmühl, Marcel Zurawka, Robert Brand and Tim Türk.

This game combines card game and rhythm game mechanics.
You can hover over a card, but it'll be played on the beat whether you like it or not. That part is out of your control.
Dodge or counter incoming attacks, draw cards or slap that smug face when you're safe - rhythm is king in this club!
Defeat the disco golem before he punches you to death!

Original Music - Tim Türk
2D Assets - Robert Brand, Lars Grevsmühl
Animations - Robert Brand, Marcel Zurawka
Programming - Jean-Luc Etgen, Marcel Zurawka
